verbs.description: If [ARG0: conservatives] [V: believe] [ARG1: in family values] , why do so many accept Trump - Sessions immigration policies that tear families apart ?
If conservatives believe in family values , why [V: do] so many accept Trump - Sessions immigration policies that tear families apart ?
If conservatives believe in family values , [ARGM-CAU: why] do [ARG0: so many] [V: accept] [ARG1: Trump - Sessions immigration policies that tear families apart] ?
